name: get_voice
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool anime_voice_waifu_ai_api.
Tool description: With this app, you can easily convert Japanese text to voice
API description: Generates a voice response from the given text using the Anime Voice Waifu AI via RapidAPI.

text.description: The text to be converted into voice.

speaker.description: The speaker's voice to use for conversion. Defaults to None.
